key.description: The key for the time tracking provider. For example, *JIRA*.

name.description: The name of the time tracking provider. For example, *JIRA provided time tracking*.

url.description: The URL of the configuration page for the time tracking provider app. For example, */example/config/url*. This property is only returned if the `adminPageKey` property is set in the module descriptor of the time tracking provider app.

description: Details about the time tracking provider.
